name: Caterpillar (itch)
description:
Caterpillar is an adventure game where player can "write" their own story by choosing some decisions.

The story of Eric , a 14th years old boy who bring his younger sister Ilva to stroll around the forest while they're on a picnic with their parents. Solving a puzzles and find something interesting on the way to the place they desire, the big lake.

Key Features:

  • Story-oriented game
  • Choice-matter that affect the story in the future
  • Beautiful hand painted environment style by Artist: Zienu
  • Two different ending situations
  • Short and simple gameplay
  • Solve puzzle 
  • Language: English

This game is a submission for IGMC 2017
